tasks.label: Kill Workit Ports
tasks.command: for p in 5100 5200 5300 7100 7200 7300; do lsof -ti tcp:$p | xargs -r kill; done

tasks.label: Open Workit Safari
tasks.command: osascript -e 'tell application "Safari" to make new document with properties {URL:"http://localhost:5100"}' -e 'tell application "Safari" to make new document with properties {URL:"http://localhost:5200/swagger"}' -e 'tell application "Safari" to make new document with properties {URL:"http://localhost:5300"}'
